dict.acceptation: 漂亮地；恰当地，规规矩矩地；精密地；非常讲究地；

sent.orig: I think It'suits you very nicely.

sent.trans: 这个软木塞正好塞得进。

sent.orig: 'so everything is going nicely and you don't need the money very badly.
sent.trans: "看来一切都满顺利，你并不十分需要那笔钱喽。

sent.orig: Careful! And it's as smooth as silk. It glides nicely through your fingers while shooting pool.
sent.trans: 小心！它跟丝一样平滑。当击球时，它会很柔顺地滑过你的手指。

sent.orig: Itwill supply those credentials just as nicely to your shopping-madteenager.
sent.trans: 它也会乖乖地为您的疯狂购物的孩子自动填写信息。
